name: 曾恕銘
objective:
本課程涵蓋資通訊技術的基礎和最新發展，內容包含網際網路工程，消息理論和資料壓縮與視訊標準 (Huffman code)，錯誤更正碼，人工智慧/深度學習，競爭型的多重存取協定(WiFi的CSMA/CA with RTS/CTS，乙太網路的CSMA/CD) ，無線視訊傳輸的抗錯(HARQ, MDC, 最佳化理論(含線性規劃))，無線資源分配之深度學習方法，感測網路，網路安全，物聯網

This course covers the basics and latest developments in information and communication technology (ICT), including Internet engineering, information theory and data compression and video standards (Huffman code), error correction codes (convolutional, turbo, Artificail intelligence/deep learning(DL), multiple access protocols (CSMA / CA with RTS / CTS for WiFi, CSMA / CD for Ethernet) , Wireless video transmission error resistance (HARQ, MDC, optimization theory (including linear programming)), radio resource allocation DL approach, sensor networks, network security, Internet of things (IoT).
schedule:
1.　　Network Protocols (網際網路工程)
2.　　IT  source coding for video standards (Huffman code)
3.　　IT channel coding introduction (消息理論和錯誤更正碼簡介)
4.　　convolutional/RS codes for 4G control channel
5.6.　　Artificail intelligence/deep learning(DL)
7.     Multiple access protocols in layer 2 (CSMA/CA with RTS/CTS for Wi-Fi)
8. 　　Error resilience(抗錯) in wireless video transmission(HARQ(RCPC+CRC), MDC, Cross-layer control, 最佳化理論(含線性規劃)
9. 　　radio resource allocation DL approach    
10.　　sensor network(感測網路)
11.　　security (optional)
12.  IoT (optional)
